content: I've actually been listening to "All Songs Considered" and "Pitchfork" lately, and they've introduced me to so many new artists and albums that I wouldn't have discovered otherwise. I'll definitely check out some of the other podcasts on your list, especially "Song Exploder" and "The Adam Buxton Podcast". Do you have any recommendations for music blogs or websites that I can follow to stay up-to-date on new music releases and industry news?
